home.slogan: It all starts with you. From amateur to champion. Get your team and write history!

inscriere.link_termeni: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
inscriere.eroare_parola: Password must be at least 12 characters long and contain lowercase, uppercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

inscriere.eroare_echipa: Invalid team name. Min 3 characters, only letters and digits.

despre.paragraf1: ChampQuest is a football management game where you take control of a team and compete for glory.
despre.paragraf2: Train your players, plan tactics, make transfers, and lead your team to the top.
despre.paragraf3: The game is beginner-friendly but offers depth for experienced managers.
despre.paragraf4: Join the community and begin your legendary career!
despre.invitat: Join now and write your legend!

regulament.reg1: 1. One account per player is allowed.
regulament.reg2: 2. No offensive language or inappropriate content.
regulament.reg3: 3. Match fixing or cheating is not permitted.
regulament.reg4: 4. Respect other players and the game staff.
regulament.reg6: 6. Advertising is allowed only with ChampQuest staff approval.
regulament.reg7: 7. The staff has the right to take action for any rule violation.
regulament.reg8: 8. You can report suspicious behavior in the game.
regulament.reg9: 9. Rules may change to improve the game. Youâ€™ll be notified of major updates.
